Example:  Adjustments Based on Reductions in Income
Situation
:  A sole surviving parent was paid DIC of $207 per month effective December 1, 2004, based on IVAP of $4,300 from earnings.  At the end of 2005, the parent reported that earnings income stopped effective June 1, 2005.  The total earned income received during 2005 was $2,100.
